Key Match Events: Draymond Green tripped Memphis' Zach Edey, leading to a retroactive flagrant foul
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Kerr and Draymond Green both lost their composure late in the game, resulting in technical fouls and Green's ejection
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was out of reach, but the two points lost to technical free throws might haunt the Warriors in the Emirates Cup
Draymond Green's added flagrant foul will make his bill to the league at least $6,000 for Friday's game
Others: Green is now at four technical fouls for the 2024-25 season, tied with Jayson Tatum for the league lead
Green passed Shaq with his opening-night technical and is now at 154 for his career, just two behind Carmelo Anthony for 15th place in NBA history
